sub_title: Scrum Master | PSM 1 Certified | ISTQB Certified | Quality Specialist |
summary: Priya is an experienced and certified Scrum Master with a strong understanding of agile principles and practices. She has proven record of leading cross-functional teams through the entire software development lifecycle. Specialized in working in onshore-offshore model. She possesses excellent communication, problem-solving, and conflict resolution skills. Apart from professional Scrum Master, Priya is an ISTQB certified tester that allows her to add more value by taking testing responsibility as well.

treasury_media.title: Certified Scrum Master and Scrum Professional

certifications.name: ISTQB® Certified Tester, Foundation Level
certifications.authority: ISTQB - International Software Testing Qualifications Board

profile_positions.description:
• Proficiently organizes and facilitates daily scrum, sprint review, retrospectives, sprint, and release planning.                            
• Acts as the primary point of contact between the team and the product owner, ensuring that all stakeholders were aligned on project goals and progress. 
• Identifies and addresses roadblocks that are preventing the team from meeting their sprint commitments.
• Helping the team to be more productive with agile methodologies and solving the impediments for continuous delivery. 
• Effectively track team’s progress, including burn down, velocity and release forecasting.                                                               
• Utilizes agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, to manage and track project progress.               
• Collaborates with product owners to define and prioritize user stories and features.
• Assuring acceptance criteria are agreed upon and stories are ready for sizing and conducting pokering.
• Participating in client meetings or demos to present progress, discuss project plans, and gather feedback.
• Facilitating and conducting online/onsite agile maturity workshops.
• Challenging teams to scale up the level of agile maturity.

In addition to the work of Scrum Master that Priya performs full-time for ShareCompany projects, she also contributes to the organization in the following area:
•	Active member of “Advisory board” that assures and take action to keep employee satisfaction index high.
• Hour management, as ShareCompany works in global delivery model (Onshore-Offshore).
• Recruitment of new colleagues in Netherlands and offshore.                                                        
• Organizing team events.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
• Focused on functional and system integration testing in STLC and SDLC methodologies.
• Designed and executed functional, regression, and integration tests on web and mobile applications.
• Reviewed test cases, test data, and test reports using test management tools.
• Collaborated with developers to troubleshoot and resolve defects.
• Responsible for Quality assurance by making sure that onsite-offshore team adheres test processes.
• Experienced good Skills in Backend Testing using SQL Queries.
profile_positions.title: Functional Tester

profile_positions.description:
Project- Kobuki robot

The Tiger Team robot is an in-house project for Topic, based on Topic products and tools which show its capabilities for robotics. The hardware of the robot consists of a Kobuki robot base with a Miami/Florida Development Kit. The objective is to create an autonomously driving robot that serves cookies through the office and able to perform basic day to day activities.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBITLIES:

•	Interviewing stakeholders to gather all functional requirements which help in writing test cases.
•	Involved in an analysis of Business Requirements.
•	Creating test template.
•	Work experience in preparing Functional/GUI Test Cases based on SRS document and execution thereof.
•	Identifying Test case scenarios with respect to Requirement document and used cases.
•	Writing detailed test scenarios, test cases, test steps.
•	Planning and scheduling of the tasks.
profile_positions.title: Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project- Wholesale Data warehouse 

Project was to do enhancement/E2E testing of one of the data warehouse system called WDW (Wholesale Data Warehouse). End Client used this warehouse data for analysis and reporting purposes. 

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

•	Work experience in preparing Functional/GUI Test Cases based on SRS documents and execution thereof.
•	Extensive experience in testing activities like Test estimation, Test planning, Test execution and Defect life cycle.
•	Worked extensively in Data warehouse and BI testing, Functional testing, Manual testing, Regression testing, User Acceptance testing (UAT), System testing, Integration testing. 
•	Creating DB scripts for testing.
•	Look up for logs, start and stop test stubs, and deploy them in Linux environment
•	Logging of Test results and tracking the defects to closure.
•	Managing the interfaces and monitor them.
•	Testing Informatica mappings and workflows extensively.
•	Planning and scheduling of the tasks.
•	Technical Design, Plan and Test cases to ensure quality.
•	Assuring that the projects meet the Quality Standards
•	Effective Documentation of the logical, functional and technical architecture for projects
profile_positions.title: Software Tester

profile_positions.description:
Project-  AAPC&R (Asset Accounting, Project Costing, and Reporting)

The Program initiative was to implement a common platform and retire redundant systems for the Asset Accounting, Project Costing, Property Tax, and Book-to-Tax functions. AAPC&R will build an enterprise-wide data structure for business reporting which will be populated using Informatica ETL. Another deliverable of the initiative was CAPS (Corporate Accounts Payable System). An online system used for tax invoice validation. 

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

•	Involved in Analysis of Business Requirements.
•	Writing Test Cases & Execution thereof.
•	Executing Informatica mappings in a test environment and doing SIT.
•	Identifying Test case scenarios with respect to Requirement documents and use cases.
•	Retesting and Regression testing on fixed defects.
•	Testing the Database by writing the Queries.
•	Review of Test cases written by other team members.
Accomplishments:
•	Good understanding of taxing system.
•	Understanding of waterfall model of working.
•	Good hands on experience in SQL and Informatica PowerCenter.
•	Extensive learning of testing method and strategies 
•	Learning of new tools and technologies
profile_positions.title: Software Tester
